author: Special Correspondent
text:
A police team nabbed two youths involved in chain-snatching cases during inspection of vehicles at Solar along Karur road on Sunday.

Periyasamy (27), a resident of a locality along Chennimalai Road, and Navinkumar (27) of Akkaraikodiveri near Gobichettipalayam, who were reportedly found travelling on an unregistered two-wheeler, had confessed to have snatched gold chains from a woman in Veerappanchathiram limits last month and from another women in Taluk station limits earlier this month.

The gold chains weighing six sovereign and 7.5 sovereign respectively were recovered from them. In another case, the Karunkalpalayam police arrested a person named Sabir for having snatched a 9.5 sovereign gold chain from an aged woman and Rs. 90,000 from a bus passenger.
title: Chain-snatchers arrested
